title: Academic Tutor
description: Tutored over 20 students with coursework related to the subject Discrete-Time Signals and Systems
Assisted students with their written assignments, homeworks, quizzes and tests

title: Research Development Intern
description: Spearheaded the development of a Full Stack voting portal from scratch
Implemented Google OAuth 2.0 API calls to securely login new and existing users to the platform
Utilized Flask & PostgreSQL Stack to store user information and the voting data

title: Software Developer
description: As a part of the CAPRI Team in Credit Suisse, I was responsible for migrating batch applications running on legacy servers into robust CSL3 (Cloud Services Lab) Red Hat Servers.
Developed a Kafka Application to read, process, and publish internal Affirm Messages making massive utilization of Oracle and Mongo for persistence.
This application was responsible for backfilling CNS (Continuous Net Settlement) Customer Trades.

title: Full Stack Software Developer

As part of the modernization efforts, I am responsible for migrating the legacy CDF App into robust, cloud-native applications on the Azure platform.
